netMsgEvent

public void netMsgEvent(NetMessage msg,
                        NetID id,
                        Monitor.Reason reason)
Description copied from interface: Monitor
Invoking this method denotes that an action related to a network message is occured on the network layer with the given NetID. The reason why this action is occured is specified by the given reason such as send, receive or drop.

Specified by:
netMsgEvent in interface Monitor
Parameters:
msg - the related network message
id - the NetId of the network layer of the occuring event
reason - the reason why this event happened
